description: Acute panic response triggered by high terror combined with alarm and rapid terror increase

prerequisites.failure_message: Requires terror+alarm with a sharp terror spike, plus high threat/arousal and dropping control (not shutdown numbness).

actor_description: It snaps on like a breaker. My heart starts hammering with no warm-up and my breath turns useless—too fast, too shallow, like I can’t get enough air no matter how much I take. The world narrows into signals and edges. My thoughts stop being sentences and become one repeating instruction: move, now—except I can’t decide where “safe” even is.
description_text: {actor} goes rigid and frantic at once—eyes wide, breath thin and rapid, hands twitching as if searching for a grip on something invisible. Their head jerks in quick scans, attention stuck on danger that seems to be everywhere at the same time.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear breathing turn sharp and fast—air dragged in like it’s not working. There’s a shaky exhale, a small broken sound in the throat, and the scrape of movement that can’t settle.
